sections.heading: residential real property appraiser, defined
sections.text: Certified residential real property appraiser means a person who holds a valid credential as a certified residential real property appraiser issued under the Real Property Appraiser Act.SourceLaws 1994, LB 1107, § 12;Laws 2006, LB 778, § 25;Laws 2007, LB1

76-2207.21.Certified residential real property appraiser, defined.

Certified residential real property appraiser means a person who holds a valid credential as a certified residential real property appraiser issued under the Real Property Appraiser Act.

SourceLaws 1994, LB 1107, § 12;Laws 2006, LB 778, § 25;Laws 2007, LB186, § 3;R.S.1943, (2009), § 76-2210.02;Laws 2015, LB139, § 13;R.S.Supp.,2016, § 76-2207.05;Laws 2018, LB741, § 10.
